name: Mass Deception
description:
Mass Deception is a game about a superhero named Awestruck who is forced to clear his name after being falsely accused of being the true villain by an anoynymous hacker called Mendax. All music, animation and coding was done by kobiOGUA.

This was a project I really had to have patience with and it took exactly 80 days. About 300 total hours were spent making this. 

 IMPORTANT: CHECK INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS!
